about_the_game:
Please Note: This scenario pack is also included in the Train Simulator Classic 2024 Deluxe Edition. If purchasing separately the following routes are required in order to play all of the scenarios: Bahnstrecke Riesa – Dresden, LGV Marseille Avignon, Mittenwaldbahn, NEC Washington DC, North Wales Coast Line.

Celebrate the 15th Anniversary of Train Simulator with this special scenario pack. This pack includes 15 new scenarios and three iconic locomotives. The British steam legend LNER Peppercorn Class A2 ‘Blue Peter’, the DB BR 411 ‘ICE-T’ high-speed EMU, and the futuristic looking Pennsylvania Railroad Class GG1 with its striking art deco shell.

With the LNER Peppercorn Class A2 you will prepare the locomotive for a return to the mainline with trial runs between Llandudno and Crewe to make sure the engine is ready for Summer railtours. Then travel back in time to 1966 to recreate the Holyhead & Brymbo special along the picturesque North Wales Coast Line.

Take the controls on the modern DB BR 411 ‘ICE-T’ as you run services on both Bahnstrecke Riesa – Dresden and Mittenwaldbahn. The latter of which gives the unique experience of driving an ICE through Austrian mountains. Enjoy the Alpine scenery with snow falling in winter or a bright summer’s day with these scenarios.

The PRR GG1 4935 has been restored for the mainline for rail tours on the Northeast Corridor. Perform a test run with this historic US loco, before running the ‘Friends of the GG1’ service for local railfans. Scenarios on Washington DC also include an ACS-64 rescue service for a broken-down Acela.

Included Locos

  • DB BR 411 'ICE-T' EMU

  • LNER Peppercorn Class A2 'Blue Peter'

  • PRR GG1

Included Scenarios

  • Blue Peter 'Running In Trials': Crewe to Llandudno

  • Blue Peter 'Running In Trials': Llandudno to Crewe

  • The Holyhead & Brymbo Special: Chester to Holyhead

  • The Holyhead & Brymbo Special: Holyhead to Chester

  • 1D83 0902 London Euston to Holyhead ‘Irish Mail’

  • ICE 1207 0828 Hamburg Hbf to Innsbruck Hbf

  • ICE 1206 1023 Innsbruck Hbf to Hamburg Hbf

  • PPR GG1 4935 Test Run

  • ‘Friends of the GG1’ Inaugural Run

  • ‘Friends of the GG1’ Railtour

  • ACS-64 to the Rescue!

  • ICE 1651 1226 Wiesbaden Hbf to Dresden Hbf (Fast Line)

  • ICE 1652 0810 Dresden Hbf to Wiesbaden Hbf (Local Line)

  • IC 2249 0731 Leipzig Hbf to Dresden Hbf

  • S1 31700 0409 Dresden Hbf to Meißen Triebischta

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum for 32-bit:
  • OS *: 32-bit Windows 7 Service Pack 1, 8.1 or 10 Required (Other OS versions and types are not supported)
  • Processor: Intel Core-i3 4330 3.50 GHz Dual Core or AMD A8 6600K 3.90 GHz Quad Core or Better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 Ti or AMD Radeon R9 Graphics with 1 GB Dedicated VRAM or Better
  • DirectX®: 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Connection (May incur additional costs for use)
  • Storage: 40 GB or more available space (Additional Add-Ons will require more)
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Audio Device
  • Additional Notes: Requires mouse and keyboard or Xbox Controller
Laptop, Notebook, Mobile or Low Power versions of the above specifications (including Intel or Integrated Graphics) may work but are not supported. Updates to Chipset, Graphics and Audio Device Drivers may be required. For information relating to recommended specifications for Train Simulator 64-bit, please refer to the Train Simulator Classic User Guide.
